parameters.name: T.Kind
parameters.description: Kind represents the type of the API object.

parameters.name: T.APIVersion
parameters.description: APIVersion defines the version of the API object.

parameters.name: O.Namespace
parameters.description: Namespace of the object, for scoped objects.

parameters.name: O.ResourceVersion
parameters.description: Resource version in the object store. This can only be set by the server.

parameters.name: O.UUID
parameters.description: UUID is the unique identifier for the object. This can only be set by the server.

parameters.name: Spec.ExportPolicies
parameters.description: Component from which the event is generated.

parameters.name: Spec.MaxRetentionTime
parameters.description: Host of the venice or workload node which is generating the event.

ResourceVersion.description: Resource version of object store at the time of list generation.

apiListMeta.description: ListMeta contains the metadata for list of objects.

Name.description: Name of the object, unique within a Namespace for scoped objects.

Tenant.description:
Tenant is global namespace isolation for various objects. This can be automatically
filled in many cases based on the tenant a user, who created the object, belongs go.

Namespace.description: Namespace of the object, for scoped objects.

ResourceVersion.description: Resource version in the object store. This can only be set by the server.

UUID.description: UUID is the unique identifier for the object. This can only be set by the server.

Labels.description: Labels are arbitrary (key,value) pairs associated with any object.

CreationTime.title: CreationTime is the creation time of Object

ModTime.title: ModTime is the Last Modification time of Object

apiObjectMeta.description: ObjectMeta contains metadata that all objects stored in kvstore must have.

Kind.description: Kind represents the type of the API object.

APIVersion.description: APIVersion defines the version of the API object.

apiTypeMeta.description: TypeMeta contains the metadata about kind and version for all API objects.

eventsAutoMsgEventPolicyWatchHelper.description:
-------------------------- Event Policy -----------------------------
Event Policy represents the policy definition for Events.
Event Client module will be consumer of this policy.

O.title:
ObjectMeta.Name will be the UUID for an event object.
TODO: Should there be a predefined list of labels or keep it free form ?

Spec.description: Attributes contains the attributes of an event.

eventsEventPolicy.description:
Event is a system notification of a fault, condition or configuration
that should be user visible. These objects are created internally by
Event client and persisted in EventDB.

T.title: Severity represents the criticality level of an event

ListMeta.title: Type represents the type of an event. e.g. NICAdmittedEvent, NodeJoined

Items.title: Message represents the human readable description of an event

eventsEventPolicyList.title: EventAttributes contains all the event attributes

ExportPolicies.description: Component from which the event is generated.

MaxRetentionTime.description: Host of the venice or workload node which is generating the event.

eventsEventPolicySpec.title:
EventSource has info about the component and
host/node that generated the event
